headline.main: U.S. Mission Is Going to Middle East to Push 'Berlin-Baghdad' Road Extension in Aid Plan

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 29 -- Brig. Gen. R. L. Maxwell, former Administrator of Export Control, will leave soon with a military mission for the Middle East to study British proposals for broad extension of railway facilities there as a means of implementing resistance to Germany by the Soviet Union.
abstract: Brig Gen R L Maxwell heads U S mil mission going to Middle East to study routes to USSR
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 29 -- Brig. Gen. R. L. Maxwell, former Administrator of Export Control, will leave soon with a military mission for the Middle East to study British proposals for broad extension of railway facilities there as a means of implement...
